articles.description: The US central bank has hiked rates by 75 basis points. Will this nudge the RBI? What impact with the Federal Reserve move have on Indian markets? What should investors do?

articles.title: Facebook India Head Quits, He Is Joining This Company - NDTV
articles.description: Social media company Meta today announced that its India head, Ajit Mohan, has stepped down to pursue another opportunity. Mr Mohan is going to join rival social media platform Snap, the company announced today.
articles.content:
